main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Lima, Ohio on multiple occasions from 1952 to 1965.
interesting points: The first sighting on 20 November 1952 lasted for about 10-15 minutes, with the observer initially mistaking the object for a shooting star., The object was believed to be about 30 feet in diameter and glowed white while moving slowly southeast., Another sighting reported on 19 July 1963 described a bright light with spinning amber lights that emitted a slight whirr and was observed moving overhead., There were no confirmed photographs or physical evidence documented in the reports., The Lima Police Department had no record of unidentified flying objects reported during the period surrounding the sightings.
witness description: an observer who reported seeing the object
